name: Combat Air Patrol 2: Military Flight Simulator
description: Feel the power of flying the AV8B Harrier II. A middle ground flight and naval combat simulator with mission planner & fully dynamic open ended campaign. Showstopping VR.
minimum_requirements: OS: 64 bit Windows 7 Processor: Core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX750/AMD R7 250/AMD A10 APU DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: 2 channel audio
recommended_requirements: OS: 64 bit Windows 10 Processor: Core i7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX970/AMD Radeon R9 280 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: 5.1 channel audio Additional Notes: TrackIR and multiple controllers
